name: Executioner

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in all battles by 17%

skills.name: Shield Bash
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Tumult
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Decreases the Turn Meter by 20%. Has a 50% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK] [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Schiltron
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 3 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

seo.description: Executioner is a rare def champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing magic damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
